worx.tip: Tip: No public API Documentation is available.
worx.paletteHelp: Get an Set events from Worx devices.
worx.help:
This connects to the Worx API server and polls it for events from Worx devices.

In order to use this node, you need to enter your username an password.
worx.input1Description: trigger this input to get all product items connected to your Worx account.
worx.input2Description: use this input to set a new value to your device. set a struct like this: {"cmd":1, "objectId":0}. objectId must be a given id in your product items. for cmd see this ENUM:enum Command : int { case PING = 0; case START = 1; case STOP = 2; case HOME = 3; case ZONE_SEARCH_REQ = 4; case LOCK = 5; case UNLOCK = 6; case RESET_LOG = 7; case PAUSE_OVER_WIRE = 8; case SAFE_HOMING = 9;}
worx.output2Description: you receive the result of set value here.
worx.output4Description: shows your product item activity log
